locations.name: Lima
locations.description: Peru's coastal capital, known for its colonial architecture and renowned culinary scene.

locations.name: Sacred Valley
locations.description: Heart of the Inca Empire in the Andes, featuring markets, Inca sites, and mountain scenery, ideal for acclimatization.

locations.name: Machu Picchu (Aguas Calientes/Machu Picchu Pueblo)
locations.description: Overnight location providing access to the iconic mountaintop citadel of Machu Picchu.

locations.name: Quito
locations.description: Ecuador's high-altitude capital with a well-preserved UNESCO World Heritage historic center.

locations.name: Galapagos Islands
locations.description: Volcanic archipelago famous for unique wildlife encounters, both on land and sea.
